title: CookiePromptManagementStatus
description: This describes the fields needed for the dashboard to display the status of CPM (Cookie Prompt Management)

consentManaged.description: A required boolean flag to indicate if consent was managed automatically by the browser

optoutFailed.description: An optional boolean flag to indicate if our attempts to optout automatically failed. Not currently used in the dashboard

configurable.description: An optional boolean to indicate whether the platform supports showing the secondary screen with a link to settings
